name: “Pump the $PISS” Yoga Mat
description: Pisscoin Home Collection Summer Season 2021 Catalog #06 - Time to stretch those bladders! - From downward dog to child’s pose, the “Pump the $PISS” Yoga Mat will help keep you focused. Relax and breathe – the dense and thick material will add extra cushion and comfort. Customized with the Pisscoin “Pump the $PISS” Fitness Model to match your practice, personality, and space. Easy to carry strap makes it effortless to go to-and-from your yoga class. Perfect for everyday practice or as an extra special gift for the guzzling yogi in your life. Buyer of this OBJKT will receive the artist’s proof of the “Pump the $PISS” Yoga Mat (70 x 24 in) seen here*, signed by Pisscoin Home Collection Chief Creative Officer, Pis Pistofferson. Shipping fees are included for addresses anywhere in the continental United States. After purchase, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram with shipping address. Item will ship within 5-7 days of purchase. For collectors outside the continental US and for all other inquiries about the artwork, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram. *Only for the first sale. Resale is subject to the Guzzler’s Oath. Any collector purchasing this OBJKT through the secondary market should contact the current owner and @dgpgallerie on Instagram to confirm the good(s) for sale.
